name.baseName: Alloy Steel ; Steel scrap, pig iron water (block), ferroalloy direct reduction iron, slagging agent ; Electric furnace method ; greater than or equal to50 t①; NESPS2
合金钢 ; 废钢、生铁水（块）铁合金直接还原铁、造渣剂 ; 电炉法 ; 大于等于50吨① ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集关注利用废钢、生铁块和铁合金直接还原的工业过程，生产纳合金钢。它广泛应用于冶金领域，制造高质量钢材，可用于各种工程应用，如生产工具、机械、汽车零部件和建筑材料。此过程采用电炉法，适合大规模钢铁生产，特别是对于产能大于或等于50吨的设施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码3120文件，在完整版文件中第4111页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6
污染物指标一般排放口颗粒物的末端治理技术是布袋除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备年正常运行小时数（小时）/生产系统年运行小时数（小时），①单台电炉日产量校核标准为：≥750吨。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为一般排放口颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为一般排放口颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6
污染物指标电炉烟气有组织颗粒物的末端治理技术是布袋除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备年正常运行小时数（小时）/生产系统年运行小时数（小时），①单台电炉日产量校核标准为：≥750吨。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为电炉烟气有组织颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为电炉烟气有组织颗粒物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPrecipitation separation + floating separation + filter separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是沉淀分离+上浮分离+过滤分离，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备年正常运行小时数（小时）/生产系统年运行小时数（小时），①单台电炉日产量校核标准为：≥750吨。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为石油类
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0，①单台电炉日产量校核标准为：≥750吨。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation + floating separation + filter separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
